android-drawables:rasterize

Full name:

com.github.kingamajick.admp:android-drawables-maven-plugin:1.0.0:rasterize

Description:

Rasterizes any SVGs contained ${svgDirectory} (default: 'src/main/svg') to '${project.build.outputDirectory}/res' for any densities specified.
  • ldpi (default)
  • mdpi (default)
  • hdpi (default)
  • xhdpi (default)
  • nodpi
  • tvdpi

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
densities List - A list of Densitys, if none are specified the following configuration is used:
  • name : 'drawable-ldpi', scale-factor : 0.75f
  • name : 'drawable-mdpi', scale-factor : 1.00f
  • name : 'drawable-hdpi', scale-factor : 1.50f
  • name : 'drawable-xhdpi', scale-factor : 2.00f
rasterizedType String - The type to raterized the SVGs to. The available formats are png and jpg
Default value is: png.
svgDirectory File - The directory containing the SVG resource to be rasterized.
Default value is: src/main/svg.

Parameter Details

densities:

A list of Densitys, if none are specified the following configuration is used:
  • name : 'drawable-ldpi', scale-factor : 0.75f
  • name : 'drawable-mdpi', scale-factor : 1.00f
  • name : 'drawable-hdpi', scale-factor : 1.50f
  • name : 'drawable-xhdpi', scale-factor : 2.00f
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${densities}

rasterizedType:

The type to raterized the SVGs to. The available formats are png and jpg
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${rasterizedType}
  • Default: png

svgDirectory:

The directory containing the SVG resource to be rasterized.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${svgDirectory}
  • Default: src/main/svg
